entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump New York Is a Sanctuary State. Mismanaged and clearly a Democratic controlled State in a deep, deep ,hole before Coronavirus. Now using this Pandemic to bail them selves out.  Like your linski's rules For radicals never let a good tragedy go to waste.
